newsitem.title: USA: Wickes names Krawczyk president, COO.
newsitem.headline: Wickes names Krawczyk president, COO.

text.p: Wickes Lumber Co said Wednesday it had named David Krawczyk as president and chief operating officer.
J. Steven Wilson previously held the position of president and will remain chairman and chief executive officer.
The position of chief operating officer has been vacant for nearly a year, the company said.
Krawczyk joined Wickes in the fourth quarter of 1996 as senior vice president of operations. He previously served as president of operations of Grossman's contractors' warehouse division.
Wickes supplies building supplies in the United States.
